title: Disable Cortana
description: Disables the Cortana voice assistant to improve privacy and performance.

title: Enable Dark Mode
description: Switches the system theme to dark mode to reduce eye strain.

title: Disable Telemetry
description: Stops Windows from sending usage data to Microsoft.

title: Increase Virtual Memory
description: Adjusts the size of the paging file to improve system performance.

title: Disable Windows Tips
description: Turns off Windows tips and tricks notifications.

title: Enable Fast Startup
description: Reduces the time it takes for your PC to start up.

title: Disable Background Apps
description: Prevents apps from running in the background to save system resources.

title: Disable OneDrive
description: Stops OneDrive from syncing files to the cloud.

title: Enable Game Mode
description: Optimizes your PC for gaming by prioritizing system resources.

title: Disable Action Center
description: Turns off the Action Center to reduce distractions.

title: Enable Storage Sense
description: Automatically frees up space by deleting unnecessary files.

title: Disable Windows Defender
description: Turns off Windows Defender to improve performance.

title: Enable High Performance Power Plan
description: Switches to the high performance power plan to boost system performance.

title: Disable Windows Update
description: Stops Windows from automatically downloading and installing updates.

title: Enable System Restore
description: Creates restore points to help recover your system in case of issues.

description: Automatically backs up your files to an external drive.

description: Disables remote assistance to improve security.

title: Enable ReadyBoost
description: Uses a USB flash drive to improve system performance.

title: Disable Superfetch
description: Disables Superfetch to improve system performance.

description: Uses part of your hard drive as virtual memory to improve performance.

description: Disables Windows Search to improve system performance.

title: Enable System Protection
description: Enables system protection to create restore points.

title: Disable Windows Update
description: Disables automatic Windows updates to prevent unexpected restarts.

title: Enable Battery Saver
description: Reduces system performance to extend battery life.

description: Disables the hibernation feature to save disk space.

description: Sets the power plan to high performance to improve system speed.

title: Enable Automatic Maintenance
description: Enables automatic maintenance to keep your system running smoothly.

description: Automatically locks your device when you are away.
